• Module 1 – Policy Overview
    What is the purpose of the Child Protection Policy and to whom does it apply?

  • Module 2 – Conduct
    What are the conduct requirements within the policy?

  • Module 3 – Background Checks
    What are the requirements regarding background and sex offender registry checks? Are there exceptions to those requirements?

  • Module 4 – Reporting Violations
    Who has a duty to report child abuse or neglect? What are the procedures for reporting suspected violations?

  • Module 5 – Supervision and Safety Requirements
    What are the requirements involving authorized adult supervision, overnight stays, and general safety?

  • Module 6 – Responsibility
    What are the roles and responsibilities according to job title? What are the rules for maintaining a list of child-related programs? Are organizations unrelated to the University that utilize University owned and leased facilities bound by the regulations of this policy?

  • Module 7 – Penalties and Protections
    What are the sanctions involved when violating this policy? Are there protections in place for retaliation?
